instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a bowl, mix sugar, flour, cocoa, and baking powder. Add eggs and milk and blend until smooth. Pour into a greased pan and bake for 35 minutes.
Cook spaghetti. Fry pancetta with garlic. Beat eggs and Parmesan, then remove pan from heat and mix with pasta. Add egg mixture to pasta, stirring quickly. Season with salt and pepper.

ingredients: Dressing: 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard, 1 minced garlic clove, Salt and pepper
instructions: In a large bowl, mix lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan. In a small bowl, whisk together dressing ingredients. Toss salad with dressing and serve immediately.
